name: victory-star

effect.sun-moon: All friendly Pokémon's moves, including this Pokémon's own moves, have 1.1× their usual accuracy while this Pokémon is in battle.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: All friendly Pokémon's moves, including this Pokémon's own moves, have 1.1× their usual accuracy while this Pokémon is in battle.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: All friendly Pokémon's moves, including this Pokémon's own moves, have 1.1× their usual accuracy while this Pokémon is in battle.

short_effect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.1× for friendly Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
